attributes.action: get the obscene language and behaviour from our tv
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just watched a program called shamless(should be banned) .i am horrified to think our children with tv s in their rooms can watch progams of this nature . The language and violent behaviour is a disgrace and our children consider it cool even normal !.This of course is not the only program like this , We need the violence and swearing removed from tv altogether .PLEASE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
